item.hotbath.herbal_bath_bucket.desc: Ancient wisdom in liquid form. Let the herbs heal your weary soul!
item.hotbath.hot_water_bucket.desc: Simple hot water, yet it washes away all fatigue.
item.hotbath.honey_bath_bucket.desc: Cleopatra's beauty secret! Soak for honey-smooth skin.
item.hotbath.milk_bath_bucket.desc: The legendary milk bath. Baby-soft skin awaits you!
item.hotbath.peony_bath_bucket.desc: Gift from the king of flowers. Immerse yourself in floral paradise.
item.hotbath.rose_bath_bucket.desc: Romantic rose petals floating on water. Your private SPA moment.
item.hotbath.hot_water_bottle.desc: Bath water, but warm water is safe to drink... right?
item.hotbath.honey_bath_bottle.desc: Smells like sweet honey... just one sip wouldn't hurt?
item.hotbath.milk_bath_bottle.desc: Has a subtle milky aroma. Bath water never looked so tempting...
item.hotbath.herbal_bath_bottle.desc: Herbal fragrance fills the air. Medicine or refreshment? Why not both!
item.hotbath.peony_bath_bottle.desc: Carries an elegant floral scent. Can bath water be this fragrant?
item.hotbath.rose_bath_bottle.desc: Rich rose aroma is intoxicating. Irresistible urge to take a sip...
item.hotbath.splash_hot_water_bottle.des: Portable sauna grenade. The sudden heat makes everyone run faster. Apply directly to the forehead.
item.hotbath.splash_honey_bath_bottle.de: Tactical adhesive deployment. Grants a sticky shield of absorption. Sweet, but incredibly annoying to wash off.
item.hotbath.splash_milk_bath_bottle.des: The ultimate debuff cleanser. Washes away your sins and status ailments. Because sometimes you just need a fresh start.
item.hotbath.splash_herbal_bath_bottle.d: A cocktail of ancient wisdom. Toughens the skin against damage. Throw it at your problems until they feel better.
item.hotbath.splash_peony_bath_bottle.de: A botanical airstrike. Bestows good fortune upon impact. Luck has never been this fragrant... or this sudden.
item.hotbath.splash_rose_bath_bottle.des: Liquid romance, delivered at high velocity. Grants the strength of a thousand thorns. Nothing says 'I care' like a face full of rose water.
item.hotbath.bath_herb.desc: Mysterious herbs from the Far East, pulsating with ancient energy. It is said to harmonize one's inner flow and cleanse the weariness of the soul.
hotbath.advancement.hot_bath.desc: Start your day with a hot bath.
hotbath.advancement.foot_health.desc: Daily wellness starts with soaking your feet.
hotbath.advancement.chronic_invalid.desc: Prescription for the frail and sick.
Only long-term immersion can cultivate your body fragrance.
